src.predictions.embedder module

class src.predictions.embedder.Embedder(embedder_fp: str = '../models/nn4.small2.v1.t7', input_shape: Tuple[int, int] = (96, 96))

Bases: object

Class is responsible for transforming face images to vectors using openface model.

vector(face_crop: numpy.ndarray[Any, numpy.dtype[Any]]) → numpy.ndarray[Any, numpy.dtype[Any]]

Creates 128-D vector using openface model.

Takes matrix with cropped face and creates blob. Passes blob to embedder which produces 128-d vector.

Bases: object

Class representing image and its properties. Gives possibility to mask image with imposer.

get_masked(optional_img: Optional[Any] = None) → numpy.ndarray[Any, numpy.dtype[Any]]

Masks image with mask imposer.
